name: The Other Shape
description:
WEB-GL NOW WORKS! PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE FOR BEST EXPIRIENCE!

A 2D maze like platformer where you have to get to the other side of the wall!  AD or left and right arrow keys to move and Space bar to jump. R to reset and ESC to pause! Hope you enjoy this little side project I made for the GeoJam where you have to make a game in a week. I made this game in 4 days while I was bored at home. 

Everything is made by me including the Music, Art, Code, UI, Unity scenes and so on...

There are 4 levels and they are quite hard to beat but give it a try! Once you've beaten the game try and beat it again but with a lower Death score!

Have Fun!

Game Music: (Made by me :) )
